snippet.title: Mechanic Escape - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's the official trailer of Mechanic Escape, the official sequel of Mechanic Infantry!
Mechanic Escape is a 2D runner-platformer with a gameplay of high pressure in a surprising universe of in-depth themes.
Release Date: 04/15/2014
Platform: Steam
Genre: 2D runner-platformer
Label: Slak Games
Publisher: Tekneo Games
